title: [突發] 多蒙特超新星辛祖入選英格蘭國家隊

replies.msg:
James Maddison, Jadon Sancho and Mason Mount have been named in the England squad for the first time.

Leicester City playmaker Maddsion, Borussia Dortmund winger Sancho and Derby's on-loan midfielder Mount are in the squad for the Nations League games against Croatia and Spain in October.

Chelsea midfielder Ross Barkley returns to the squad for the first time since May 2016.

There are six uncapped players in boss Gareth Southgate's 25-man squad.

Fulham keeper Marcus Bettinelli, Southampton counterpart Alex McCarthy and Watford midfielder Nathaniel Chalobah are the other uncapped players.

"It aligns with what we have done in the last 18 months," said Southgate.

"We have got a few injuries in midfield, in particular. There are some exciting young players who we have been tracking and it is a great opportunity for us to look at them."

replies.msg:
佢係唔續約免費走人，冇轉會費收
作為曼城球迷都冇得怪佢，始終年青球員喺而家曼城既曼城唔會有機會上場
當年3個最有潛力既青訓sancho，foden，diaz
sancho最先完約，去多蒙特越踢約好
diaz下年完約，我諗佢應該都唔續，自由身走人搵多啲上場時間
foden份約好似都係得返年幾，就算佢而家俾咁多人關注，睇得出球會教練都睇好佢
但係我都係平常心，佢唔續約都唔出奇
同你同期既sancho出去踢波入埋國家隊，你仲要喺球會爭取上場時間，真係寧願出去闖下仲好
